values:
for some reason, I can't stayed logged in from page to page, so I can't delete this journal.

This is my last entry in here...on lj.  I can't keep doing this, it's getting to the point that it's taking all of my energy.  I've tried to be nice, I've tried to be everyone's friend, but somehow, I have fingers being pointed at me telling me I have evil intentions.  It may not have been said this way, but this is what I feel like it's saying.  So, I think the only way to solve this petty fight is to put a stop to all of it right here.  The people who need to know where to find me, already do.

Your love is... by ChibiMarronchan
Your name is...
Your kiss is...erotic
Your hugs are...gentle
Your eyes...sparkle like the stars
Your touch is...awakening my heart
Your smell is...amazing
Your smile is...encouraging
Your love is...unique
Quiz created with MemeGen!

wow, not exactly how I wanted to start the day...Justin calls me at 9 this morning to announce that him and Cory just had a wreck.  Here's what happened from what I was told and understand.  They were going down Blaylock road doing around 50 and the hit a patch of gravel.  The back end broke loose and Cory locked up and slammed the gas down.  When he did, they shot across the road and hit a power pole, snapping it in half.  When they hit the pole, all of the windows busted out and Cory flew out of the car.  Justin remained inside and ended bouncing all across the car while it was flipping in th air.  The car landed on all fours (litterally, the ends of the car was touching the ground).  By the time Justin got out of the car, Cory was already standing up.  Hardly a scratch on him.  Justin tried to walk, but collapsed.  He injured he knee badly when they hit the pole.  They both walked away from the accident without any serious injury and no broken bones.  Neither of them were wearing seat belts, both of them ended up with glass all in them..in their arms, back, hiands, and their heads.  They are so lucky to be alive......let alone walking.

OOh, it's too early in the morning.  *yawns*

So it looks like we're all ready to throw away this stupid crap and move on!  Yeah :)  Hopefully we can all be civil now....

this just got way out of hand way too fast.

this is getting ridiculous.  Marah comes up to me in the hall and asks me "What are you waiting for, Nikki told me you were waiting for something."  And I told her, "I was waiting for you to come up to me in the hallway like this."  She got pissed off because she did exactly as I thought she would so she raises her fist in the air like she's going to punch me, and I said, "Go ahead, hit me.  I'm not fighting you."  Scotti grabbed her fist and I turned around and walked away.


this is stupid.  I'm not fighting her and giving him the satisfaction.

Sitting in Mrs. D's room...kinda bored.
 Sam's going home in a couple of weeks and I'm going to miss him so much!  He keeps asking when my pool's gonna be open so he can come over and go swimming, but he's not bringing his brother or sister, he refuses.  He's so crazy, I can't believe he's going home soon. :(  I'm sad about that.

I'm so drained...I'm tired, sore, and completely drained.  I feel like I got no where today with you.  What you said this afternoon was so hurtful and so selfish, I couldn't even begin to understand where you were coming from.  I called you to tell you I was done with, done with your bullshit, your lies, you hatred towards me for nothing...and you.... by the time we got off the phone had me in tears two or three times.  HOW IN THE HELL DO YOU DO THAT?  YOU MANIPULATE ME.  I talked to you later and everything was ok again....just like nothing happened a couple hours earlier.  I know tomorrow I see you, smile, say hello and the cycle will start all over again.  I'm too fucking stupid to just look at you and say, "Fuck you, I'm done with you hurting me."  I'm too stupid, too tired of fighting you.  Why am I fighting you?  I never win.

when I need someone here to cheer me up, I'm all alone.  My friend in PA commited suicide last week.  He jumped out of an 8 story building over his girlfriend....so yeah, there goes my happy sunshine.  So I don't want to hear it from anyone, I bet it's going a million times better for you.

the weird part is, I was just thinking about him not more than a week ago. I haven't thought about him in years and then out of no where I have a dream about him...then this.

I'm done

so last night we made love under the stars...something I've wanted to do forever.  You make me so happy, and I just don't know how to act sometimes.  This past weekend was fun, I really enjoyed being part of the Shiloh living history event.  You were wonderful and fun.  I love spending time with you..just hanging out together.  When I was running through the field out there, I tripped and fell, laughing.  You followed me and ended up holding yourself up over me...could it be anymore perfect?

well....tomorrow night I'm driving up to Memphis with my parents and then Thursday I'm flying to Paris :)  I'm pretty excited and I can't wait to see everything.
  
 I got my pictures from prom today (Marah looks adorable in her pic with Scotti!) and I'm pretty pleased with them.  I got a really good one of the guys.  I'll have something to look at in Paris.

I'm going to bed now, so everyone wish me luck! :)


I'll miss you guys

Friday was prom, and that was a blast! I had so much fun. I actually danced and it was awesome :) There was a group of us on the dance floor..Jen, Marah, Meagan, Morgan, and who could forget, Niccole. We had a ton of fun and Marah was shaking her groove thing out there :P Everyone looked awesome in their dresses (Kayla was adorable!). I had a lot of fun and I can't wait to do it all again next year. I leave for Paris this Thursday....I'm excited we have a new teacher in Mrs. Ashmore's class today.

prom is tonight and I can't wait!  I never thought I would like the idea of getting all dressed up an parading around, but it sounds fun now.  I went shopping with Miss Nina yesterday (Justin's mom)  She bought me some new clothes for Paris, took me to get my nails done, and bought me some stuff from bath & body....I'm so excited.  Tonight is prom, and by this time next week, I'll be in Paris.
   

   my mom's home, so now we can get started.

so I don't update enough...eh, doesn't matter much I've spent four days with Justin..I just got home half an hour ago and I miss him so damn bad already. I love spending time with him and being at his house. I love his momma to death, and his dads something else. Prom's Friday, and I a little excited....I finally have an excuse to dress up! Miss Nina is taking me to get my nails done Thursday. Me and Justin are going to be very busy prom night. Everyone wants pictures! Then next week I fly off to Paris! That's what I'm super excited about. I wish Justin could go and see everything with me...I know he'd love it. He makes me so incredibly happy, I don't know what else to say If I die Tomorrow as the meanings fade away I cant remember Have I said all I can say? Your my everything You make me feel so alive If I die tomorrow.... It brings out the worst in me when your not around i miss the sound of your voice the silence seems so loud Cause theres no one else, since i found you I know its been so hard you should know.... and when I look at you, all I feel is this warm spot inside and I completely melt just for you. I look at those beautiful blue eyes and wonder who could ever resist those.

it's absoloutly beautiful outside today!  Me and Justin took my little sister to the park to get her out of the house and to play softball :)  It was fun.  I love doing simple things like with him.  Right now Elizabeth is fixing me lunch and Justin's crashing on the couch watching something about cars...

we'll be leaving here before to long to continue our journey for the day. 

I love him mucho grande!  Have a great weekend everyone :)

I was wondering since when did you use double standards? Tell me that if he ever hurt me in anyway, you would kill him...and yet, I've shed more tears over you than anyone in my entire life. How does that work out in your mind?

today in class, you started in with your ugly little remarks, interupted me (on multiple occasions in which I WAS right) and then proceeded to tell people how arrogant I was. Mr.Hinton told me what you said and then he asked you, "How can she have any arrogance when you're always cutting her down?" I don't know what it is I do to make you hate me so much. Sitting there, reading my book, minding my business and you have to say something so ugly it makes me cry. You tell me I shouldn't worry about what you say because it doesn't matter..but you know very well that I can't do that. So I get defensive and angry because I'm hurt and unsure of how else to act because no matter what I say or do, it's going to be thrown right back in my face as if I'm wrong somehow no matter what it is. Maybe I'm just being to childish....but you know what?

THIS IS HOW I FEEL

and you made me feel this way

this weekend was fun..I got to visit some of my "family"...but I'll tell you what, I think I'd claim them before the half that I'm blood with. I missed Justin so much....we talked on the phone and told him that I had to sing these two parts of a Dokken song to him "Out of all the people in my life I love you more And I hope that time will find a way to make it sure That we stay one and the same" "You're the only person in my life And I hope that time will find a way to make it right And whatever happens you will know I love you more" I love him so much...he brings the sunshine out in me

my boyfriend is aggervating me...he's reading this, smiling...now he's correcting my spelling...he's retarded



but I couldn't love him more *slap across his arm*

last night was awesome..I was gone.  I remember telling Ashley that the chips I was eating tasted like color...I called my boyfriend every five minutes trying to explain how much I loved him...and I then I got other people to call for me :)  Everyone had a big old time, and it was really awesome

Ash was drunk..along with Kayla, Dru, Mel, Casey and me and eventually a few more souls.  And a good bit of us were high.

over all, fucking awesome.

CAROLANN
C is for Colorful
A is for Adaptable
R is for Rich
O is for Odd
L is for Lovesick
A is for Astounding
N is for Neat
N is for Natural
What Does Your Name Mean?

I haven't updated in a while....me and Marah are talking, and it's wonderful. I love making new friends! Valentine's Day was nice...I got my present from Justin and the little note he wrote was probably the best part.....(not saying I didn't like the other things) to: Carolann If I had a star for every time you made me smile I would have a night sky in the palm of my hand I love you the other night, we we're going driving around and I was singing "Crazy" by Patsy Cline and a few mintues later, we ended up at the boat launch and he said to turn on the radio and put it on a country station (Justin hates country). I turn it on and a few minutes later "Crazy" comes on the radio....I looked at him and said "How the hell did you do that?" I couldn't believe it..... yeah, life's great :D

was having a good day, but like always someone has to come along and burst my little bubble.  Like in sixth period, Scotti called me spoiled in front of the entire calss and then continued to argue with me about it.  I still haven't figured out what makes me so spoiled to him....so lately I'm I guess I'm just a bit apathetic to the things I should be very emotional over.  Justin's not doing so great in half of his classes and he says I sound just like his mom.....so what if I do.  I just want him to have the chance to further his education incase he wanted to after high school.....he doesn't care about anything anymore "except for me", according to him.  I don't know why I'm so angry right not, I guess that I really don't have a reason to be angry at anyone...but I really don't feel like being all that fucking logical right now.

100 Years by Five for Fighting
"Every day's a new day... 15 there's still time for you Time to buy and time to choose Hey 15, there's never a wish better than this When you only got 100 years to live" 2004 was about thinking and reflecting - but isn't every year?
What 2004 Hit Song Are You?
I love that song :)
yesterday Justin sent me half a dozen roses....they're absoloutly gorgeous and I can't believe it...he's so wonderful.

The Great LiveJournal
Outage of 2005

During the outage I hoped that pressing reload page would bring live journal back.

What did you do?

Brought to you by geek-foo

I'm sick and it's really icky...damn cold sinus bullshit..

hot tea is yummy :)

friday night, pouring rain so hard neither of us can see..and just as I'm about to suggest we pull over, you miss the first bridge on gunshoot road and we drop off into what I thought was going to be deep water...but it's usually a dry little creek, so we were ok, but we were stuck.  

so Justin almost died twice this past week... :P  we've gone through some crazy shit together so far, now we're both a little scared of what's left, ha.

my head hurts and Teresa's being a bitch.....but I'm still smiling :)

today's been great.  I've kinda stepped back and looked at my life and realized that I have so much to be thankful for that I usually just take for granted.  So right now, I'm in a state of awe...I have so much right here in front of me, why wouldn't I be happy?

new years was uneventful....I was out of town and traveling....sorry that I missed Kayla's birthday.  I had something planned for ya girl, but I went out of town Thursday.

my mom sucks.

"A long December and there's reason to believe
Maybe this year will be better than the last
I can't remember the last thing that you said as you were leavin'
Now the days go by so fast

And it's one more day up in the canyons
And it's one more night in Hollywood
If you think that I could be forgiven...
I wish you would"


if someone only knew
there really are no words to describe what me and Justin did yesterday...so how about some great pics?  I got a couple weird looks at wal-mart for these ;)
your word for how beautiful I am since there are no words to describe it: intransical

I can't wait to show everyone the bracelet Justin got me...it's so cute and it has my initials on it and I love it!  

Merry Christmas everyone, and Happy Birfday to Jesus! :)

tonight was nice...short, but nice.  We layed about on the couch doing stupid things like watching football then we watched tv in your room.  We didn't do much, just snuggled up close together and layed there.  It was wonderful to just lay in your arms...I wish it would last forever...

the concert was so awesome!  Future Leaders of the World opened and they were pretty awesome....then some random band from Georgia, they were also ok.  Then Silvertide played and things started to get good.  The leader singer was awesome and he went around slapping hands and things like that (the last bands wouldn't do it) and he grabbed my hand and he bent down and kissed it.  I was very envied by the other girls around me!  It was pretty awesome.  I got a guitar pick from the guitarist of Silvertide.  Then it was time for Shinedown!  Their performance was spectacular!  They were awesome....I got to hold Brents (the lead singer) hand twice and Brad (the bassist) looked right at me and smiled...they put on a great show (oh and Scotti, you were wrong!  The lead singer sounds better live than on his cd, and this was his last concert of the tour and he sounded amazing!  so blah!)  When they finished playing the drummer threw his drum sticks and I got one and dad caught one, but he gave it to the girl standing by him because me and the girls already had a drum stick each.  It was fucking awesome!  I can't wait to go to another concert...

last night there was a meteor shower so we put a blanket in the bed of Justin's truck, threw down a couple of pillows and then covered up with another blanket to keep warm and then watched the sky together.  It was wonderful, he kissed me on my cheek and told me he loved me and pulled me closer to keep me warm.  The sky was so clear, and the stars were so bright...

It's too early.....daddy woke us up at 4 to tell us to come down stairs because the weather was really bad, then he sent us back to our rooms, but I can't sleep.  I'm sitting here yawning like you would believe, but as soon as my head hits a pillow, I'm wide awake...this sucks ass beyond belief.

What number are you?

haha.....the scary part is, I like to nibble ;)

today was wonderful....it's beautiful outside. It's dark and rainy...you look so cute when you look up at me with those big blue eyes and your dark wet hair....it's deffinately a moment I'll remember forever.
      
incubus are love
brought to you by the isLove Generator

I can't wait to be home again...I love visiting my family because it's complete chaos the entire time, but I wish that I could hear Justin's voice.....

did I mention I have a very nosey family that's reading this as I type it?

Last night Justin took me out to eat and then we rented a movie and brought it back to my house....we actually watched most of this movie, unlike the rest of the movies we've rented :) Then he took me for ice cream, and taught me how my brakes work. After that we came back to my house for a little bit. He had to leave soon so he tucked me in....I started to cry. I didn't want him to leave. He said, "Baby, just remember that whenever you're thinking bout me and you miss me, just remember that I love you. " Then I cried even more....lol. I cried for a long time. I didn't want him to leave because I knew I wouldn't be able to see him again until Monday. He picked me up and let me curl up in his lap and he held me in his arms as I cried. I buried my face in his chest and he said, "Baby, just remember this." After almost an hour of this, I finally had to make him leave. He wasn't going to leave until I stopped crying or fell asleep....

Yeah, I know, I know.....he spoils me rotten.....and I love him for it.

Sunday my family was out of town and Teresa had to work....Justin's family was also out of town.  Needless to say, we had fun :D  He brings out some strange things in me..haha

he likes my skirt ;)

a bottomless pit
it sinks to the grave
a rising fall
of a godless slave

a broken line
an unfinished curse
thinking he'd be fine
never knowing her worst


blinded by the star
a mans eyes bleed
the brilliance mars
his obvious need




and that's all I've gotten done
I feel like I'm running with my eyes closed

Scotti called me and asked my to come watch his dad play.  I wish he would have called me before I made plans...I've already decided that I'll definitely see him play next weekend if he still wants me to come.

It was a crazy night....but definitely fun.  Me, Justin, and Wesley hung out at Justin's house.  I met Sara's brother's girl, and that was a different experience....pregnant people are crazy.

I'm going to bed now.  Hopefully Scotti will call me tomorrow.

today was long, but deffinately a good day.  Me and Scotti finally talked like decent people.  I'm so worried about him....I just don't know what to do but listen and try to help.  It kills me to think about what he's going through, I've been there and it's the worse feeling in the world to deal with.  I just don't want him to lose it.

I haven't been writting a lot in here lately...not much to write about

  Ashley has to get a lung transplant soon, and I don't want her to have to deal with that.  Her birthday was Monday, she turned 18!  To think, the doctors said she would never see the age of 3.  In yo' face!

Anyway, listening to Chevelle, and being extremely bored.  Right now I feel like I'm watching everyone live, and it's a little weird.  I don't feel right today.  I mean, I feel ok, but I don't feel quiet normal.  I feel like I'm off in my own little world observing everything taking place without me.  I feel like I'm locked in the retreat I used to visit inside my head years ago.  When I used to watch everything from a cemetary in my head...strange..dont' ask.

eh, I htink I need medication.

Friday night was awesome.  The game was ok, I had to keep an eye on my little cousins and we lost like always.  It was after the game that rocked..me and a couple of my buddies went and got high..haha.  Then we went to the dance and Lulu was dancing and doing the robot..I was laughing so hard.  Then me and Justin went and drove around.  We ended up parking at Lake Lowndes.  We talked about everything...

am I falling too fast?
